  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.BodyTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccordionTag, BasePropertyTag, ButtonTag, DialogBoxTag, GuidesTag, GuideTag, SearchPropertiesGroupTag, SectionTag

    public abstract class BaseActionFormElementTag
extends BaseTag
    Classe que define a estrutura básica para um componente de um formulário.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    fvilarinho
    See Also:
